name: LoopOS
description:
You have one mission -- Work out why your PC reboots every 3 minutes. 

If you have a hard time remembering details, a piece of paper is recommended. 

Thank you to M4taiori & magedu at freesound.org for the soundbytes

https://freesound.org/people/M4taiori/sounds/331428/
https://freesound.org/people/magedu/sounds/262223/
